review: I had food poisoning from 10 days and doctor asked entire history with patience, made the diagnosis and gave treatment. He is a senior specialist and it feels good when he patiently took time to hear me out completely and then explained things nicely even if I had a small issue.

Good doctor who patiently hears out the patients queries & answers them all

Very friendly and down to earth person

I was visiting Bangalore and looking for a second opinion on my medical diagnosis. Dr. Shivaprasad was referred to me by my friend and trust me the best thing I did

He was very patient in taking the time to understand my case and referred to the right follow-up tests required to double-check everything and stayed with me through the journey, kept me updated and communicated every step, and gave me clarity. It was a very positive experience and he will be my family's #1 go-to doctor.

His patience and simple way of communicating, and the way he makes himself available for his patients are unmatched in anyway

I visited Dr Shivaprasad C  last month and found him to be very approachable and flexible with patient care.  He advised only required tests which are  necessary. After I shared my test reports, he promptly responded with advice and next steps.  Quite happy with his approach, diagnosis, explanation, advice and patient care .

Highly recommended Doctor.
I’ve seen many practitioners but Mr Shivaprasad is highly experienced and his well mannered behaviour with patients is appreciative.
The way Doctor treat you and his smiling treatment make you feel very comfortable and he’s empathetic listener too.

First thing i felt about Dr Shivaprasd is that he carries a lot of positive vibe, happy and smiling human being, who listen to you patiently without any interruption and provides so much of confidence and treat the illness to the point.  We are very happy to get such a professional doctor. Thanks doc for everything. He is now our family doctor. I won't hesitate to recommend to any of my family/friends
reply_text: Thanks mr Viraj for your kind words and appreciation.

review: We went to see Dr. Shivaprasad for my aged father whom he has treated in NH. An excellent doctor who explains the cause and effect. Listens well to the problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted Dr.Shivaprasad during covid. He was very friendly and explained about the condition very well.
Highly competent, kind, patient and friendly. He listened to my issues calmly, and gave a clear and satisfying explanation.
Nice and quite friendly, easy to do appointment. Listen to my problem nicely without being in a hurry
reply_text: Thanks Mr Arijit for your genuine appreciation. Looking forward to serve more for needy patients
